pr_title: The enforcer rule to follow Maven's way for optional for non-BOM project

timeline.message: Enforcer rule to follow Maven's way for optional

timeline.bodyText: This is Maven's default behavior of handling optional.
timeline.author: suztomo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -276,6 +277,7 @@ private static ClassPathResult findProjectClasspath(
           new AndDependencySelector(
               new NonTestDependencySelector(),
               new ExclusionDependencySelector(),
+              new OptionalDependencySelector(),
